channel.title: Unshadow on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Unshadow on TLDRBins

item.title: Shadow Hash Cracking
item.description: Shadow Hash Cracking # Prepare an unshadowed hashes file unshadow passwd shadow > unshadowed john hashcat john --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt unshadowed # yescrypt john --format=crypt --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt unshadowed hashcat -m 7400 unshadowed /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt --force --user
